# Requirements for LLVM Premerge CI
# This file lists the core Python dependencies for the CI scripts

# Test result parsing
junitparser==3.2.0

# Cloud storage for caching
google-cloud-storage==3.3.0

# GitHub API integration  
PyGithub==2.8.1

# Note: Additional dependencies are managed in all_requirements.txt
# which is generated by pip-compile with hashes for security
